sentences.en: Cartons of Chinese food were arrayed on a large oak table.
sentences.cn: 在一张宽大的橡树桌上摆放着一盒盒中式食品。

sentences.en: Chen was an initiate of a Chinese spiritual discipline.
sentences.cn: 陈是某个中国神学领域的新入门者。

sentences.en: Chinese peasants farm their own plots.
sentences.cn: 中国农民在他们自己的土地上耕作。

sentences.en: Chinese waiters stood in a cluster, sharing a private joke.
sentences.cn: 华人服务生们站在一起，讲着只有他们自己才懂的笑话。

sentences.en: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.cn: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

sentences.en: Her Chinese friends referred to the Empress as their venerable ancestor.
sentences.cn: 她的中国朋友们说这位女皇是他们值得敬仰的祖先。

sentences.en: The Chinese make a point of their personal honor.
sentences.cn: 中国人特别重视个人荣誉.

sentences.en: The Foreign Minister held talks with his Chinese counterpart.
sentences.cn: 外交部长与中国外交部长举行了会谈。

sentences.en: The jet entered Chinese airspace without permission.
sentences.cn: 那架喷气式飞机未经允许闯入中国领空。

sentences.en: The names are direct borrowings from the Chinese.
sentences.cn: 这些名称是直接从汉语中舶来的。

sentences.en: The ship will remain outside Chinese territorial waters.
sentences.cn: 这艘船将继续呆在中国领海之外。

sentences.en: The word "ginseng" comes from the Chinese word "ren-shen".
sentences.cn: ginseng这个词来自汉语的“人参”。

sentences.en: These texts give the reader an insight into the Chinese mind.
sentences.cn: 这些文章使读者对中国人的思维有了深层次的认识。

sentences.en: Tonight they take on a Chinese pairing in their bid to reach the final tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 今晚他们将挑战一对中国选手，争取进入明天的决赛。

sentences.en: You can buy it ready-made at Chinese groceries.
sentences.cn: 在中国杂货店里你可以买到现成的。

phrases.tran_cn: 中餐；中国食物；中式食品

trans.tran_cn: 中国的，中国人的，中国话的，中文的
trans.tran_en: relating to China, its people, or its language
